parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From eu and aggelos; to announce good news especially the gospel.
(a) adj: dead, lifeless, subject to death, mortal, (b) noun: a dead body, a corpse. From an apparently primary nekus; dead.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: Properly, to distinguish, i.e. Decide; by implication, to try, condemn, punish.
A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.
Flesh, body, human nature, materiality; kindred.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To live, be alive. A primary verb; to live.
A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
